add_server_desc: Enter the name and address for the server. If the port is omitted the default one will be automatically inserted.
add_server_error_no_name: Please enter a name for the server
add_server_error_no_address: Please enter an address for the server
add_server_error_name_already_exists: This server name already exists, please enter a different name
add_server_error_address_already_exists: This server address already exists, please enter a different address
requires_password: This server requires a password to connect
no_password: This server doesn't require a password to connect
password_prompt_desc: This server requires a password to join, enter the password on the prompt below

error_unavailable_username_desc: This server does already have a player logged in using your username.
error_unknown_desc: Some unknown error ocurred while trying to connect to the server.
error_failed_to_fetch_data_desc: The server didn't respond or rejected the game info request. Check the server address.
